import React from 'react' import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import './head.css' const section = () => { // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/rules-of-hooks const [t, i18n] = useTranslation("global"); const handleChangeLanguage = (lang) => { i18n.changeLanguage(lang); }; return (

{t("section.h1")}

{t("head.span")}
) } export default section
